\Aura\Marshal\Entity

\Aura\Marshal\EntityMagicArrayAccessTrait

Use this trait for magic __get(), __set(), __isset(), and __unset() on any entity class that implements ArrayAccess for its fields.

Tags

todo

Methods

__get()

__get(string $field) : mixed

Calls ArrayAccess::offsetGet() to get a field value; converts Lazy objects for related entities and collections in place.

Parameters

string $field

The field name to get.

Returns

mixed —

The field value.

File
Entity/MagicArrayAccessTrait.php

Tags

todo

__set()

__set(string $field, mixed $value) : void

Calls ArrayAccess::offsetSet() to set a field value.

Parameters

string $field

The field name to get.
mixed $value

Set the field to this value.

File
Entity/MagicArrayAccessTrait.php

Tags

todo

__isset()

__isset(string $field) : bool

Calls ArrayAccess::offsetExists() to see if a field is set.

Parameters

string $field

The field name to check.

Returns

bool

File
Entity/MagicArrayAccessTrait.php

Tags

todo

__unset()

__unset(string $field) : void

Calls ArrayAccess::offsetUnset() to unset a field.

Parameters

string $field

The field name to unset.
